<?php
// CORS Headers
header("Access-Control-Allow-Origin: *");
header("Content-Type: application/json");
header("Access-Control-Allow-Methods: POST, GET, PUT, DELETE");
header("Access-Control-Allow-Headers: Content-Type");

$host = '127.0.0.1';
$db   = 'brew-cave_db';
$user = 'root';
$pass = '';

try {
	$pdo = new PDO("mysql:host=$host;dbname=$db;charset=utf8mb4", $user, $pass);
} catch (Exception $e) {
	die(json_encode(["error" => $e->getMessage()]));
}

$method = $_SERVER['REQUEST_METHOD'];
$data = json_decode(file_get_contents("php://input"), true) ?: [];

// Table and allowed columns (example: roles)
$TABLE = 'roles';
$COLUMNS = ['id', 'name', 'permissions'];

switch($method) {
	case 'POST':
		$filtered = array_intersect_key($data, array_flip($COLUMNS));
		$keys = implode(', ', array_keys($filtered));
		$placeholders = implode(', ', array_fill(0, count($filtered), '?'));
		$stmt = $pdo->prepare("INSERT INTO $TABLE ($keys) VALUES ($placeholders)");
		$stmt->execute(array_values($filtered));
		echo json_encode(["message" => "Added successfully", "id" => $pdo->lastInsertId()]);
		break;
	case 'GET':
		$sql = "SELECT * FROM $TABLE";
		// Optional: filter by query string
		if (!empty($_GET)) {
			$filters = array_intersect_key($_GET, array_flip($COLUMNS));
			if ($filters) {
				$where = [];
				foreach ($filters as $k => $v) {
					$where[] = "$k = :$k";
				}
				$sql .= " WHERE " . implode(' AND ', $where);
			}
		}
		$stmt = $pdo->prepare($sql);
		if (!empty($filters)) {
			foreach ($filters as $k => $v) {
				$stmt->bindValue(":$k", $v);
			}
		}
		$stmt->execute();
		echo json_encode($stmt->fetchAll(PDO::FETCH_ASSOC));
		break;
	case 'PUT':
		if (!isset($data['id'])) {
			echo json_encode(["error" => "Missing id for update"]); exit;
		}
		$id = $data['id'];
		unset($data['id']);
		$filtered = array_intersect_key($data, array_flip($COLUMNS));
		$set = [];
		foreach ($filtered as $k => $v) {
			$set[] = "$k = ?";
		}
		$stmt = $pdo->prepare("UPDATE $TABLE SET ".implode(', ', $set)." WHERE id = ?");
		$stmt->execute(array_merge(array_values($filtered), [$id]));
		echo json_encode(["message" => "Updated successfully"]);
		break;
	case 'DELETE':
		if (!isset($data['id'])) {
			echo json_encode(["error" => "Missing id for delete"]); exit;
		}
		$stmt = $pdo->prepare("DELETE FROM $TABLE WHERE id = ?");
		$stmt->execute([$data['id']]);
		echo json_encode(["message" => "Deleted successfully"]);
		break;
	default:
		echo json_encode(["error" => "Unsupported method"]);
}
?>
